meanings.definition: The process of moving forward or making progress.
meanings.sent1: His advancement in math class was evident from his improved test scores.
meanings.sent2: The advancement of technology has greatly impacted our daily lives.
meanings.sent3: The turtle's slow advancement towards the finish line was both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her advancement in the company was like climbing a ladder to success.
meanings.sent5: The advancement of spring brought colorful flowers and warmer weather.

meanings.definition: A promotion or rise in rank or position.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, she finally received the advancement she deserved.
meanings.sent2: His quick advancement from intern to manager surprised everyone in the office.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's advancement to head of the colony led to some comical situations.
meanings.sent4: Her advancement to team leader was like winning a trophy for her dedication.
meanings.sent5: The sudden advancement in his career left him feeling both excited and nervous.

meanings.definition: The act of furthering or improving something.
meanings.sent1: The advancement of medical research has saved countless lives.
meanings.sent2: She saw great advancement in her painting skills after taking art classes.
meanings.sent3: The robot's advancement in learning new tasks was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His advancement in repairing old cars was like bringing life back to forgotten vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The constant advancement in technology continues to shape our future.
